Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV10per.name: persistent
Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV10per.abstract: Performs a version check daily, but allows the user to skip updating the app until the next time the app becomes active.

Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV7rela.name: relaxed
Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV7rela.abstract: Performs a version check weekly, but allows the user to skip updating the app until

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreAppIDFailure
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving trackId as the JSON does not contain a ‘trackId’ key.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreDataRetrievalEmptyResults
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving App Store data as JSON results were empty. Is your app available in the US? If not, change the countryCode variable to fix this error.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreDataRetrievalFailure(underlyingError:)
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving App Store data as an error was returned.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreOSVersionUnsupported
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The version of iOS on the device is lower than that of the one required by the app verison update.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreVersionArrayFailure
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving App Store verson number as the JSON does not contain a version key.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: currentVersionReleaseDate
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The currentVersionReleaseDate key is missing in the JSON payload. Please leave an issue on https://github.com/ArtSabintsev/Siren with as many details as possible.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: malformedURL
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: One of the iTunes URLs used in Siren is malformed. Please leave an issue on https://github.com/ArtSabintsev/Siren with as many details as possible.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: missingBundleID
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Please make sure that you have set a Bundle Identifier in your project.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: recentlyPrompted
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Siren will not present an update alert if it performed one too recently. If you would like to present an alert every time Siren is called, please consider setting the UpdatePromptFrequency.immediately rule in RulesManager

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: releasedTooSoon(daysSinceRelease:releasedForDays:)
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The app has been released for X days, but Siren cannot prompt the user until Y (where Y > X) days have passed.
